description: In this Apache HBase course, you will learn about HBase NoSQL database and how to apply it to store Big Data. This includes an introduction to Non-relational database, how NoSQL differs from traditional database system, comparison of HBase with HDFS and in-depth knowledge of Apache HBase. This course on HBase shows how HBase stores data in a Hadoop cluster. You will also learn to load data in HBase from various tools such as Pig, Hive, Sqoop, etc.
title: Comprehensive Course on Apache Hadoop Database: Apache HBase
